0.Q: You are walking through the forest when you trip on a sleeping bear. What do you do?

eatbear.S: Before you can eat the bear, the bear eats you!

caressbear.S: The bear wakes up to the gentle touch of your strong yet supple hands. He enjoys it immensely.
caressbear.Q: What do you do to the bear next?

crossfitbear.S: The bear, having just been awakened, is in no mood for crossfit and decapitates you.

fruitsnacksbear.S: The bear greatly enjoys your fruitsnacks. He eats all of them.

chewbear.S: Suprisingly, the bear enjoys the sensation of your teeth gnawing at his gnarly coat.
chewbear.Q: What's next? You can't possibly chew on the bear forever!

chewlongerbear.S: You chew for one minute longer.

jawfallsoffbear.S: You chew so much that your jaw falls off your face.

stopchewingbear.S:
The bear becomes angry because you have stopped chewing.

He eats your face.

stateoftheunionbear.S:
You: "Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, members of the 105th Congress, distinguished guests, my fellow Americans: I think I should start by saying thanks for inviting me back."
Bear: "..."
You: "I come before you tonight with a challenge as great as any in our peacetime history â€“ and a plan of action to meet that challenge, to prepare our people for the bold new world of the 21st century."
Bear: "What is this shit?!"
You: "..."

bearpunts.S: The bear punts you to China.
